Determines how string representations of pathnames are interpreted by the constructors of {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/path|std::filesystem::path}} that accept strings.

{{dsc|{{tt|auto_format}}|Implementation-defined pathname format, auto-detected where possible}}
{{dsc end}}

===Notes===
On POSIX systems, there is no difference between native and generic format.
